import React, {useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FormControl, TextField, makeStyles, FormLabel, Grid, Button, ButtonGroup, Box, Radio, RadioGroup, FormGroup,FormControlLabel , Container, InputLabel, MenuItem, Select, Icon} from '@material-ui/core'; import './App.css'; import { green, orange, yellow} from '@material-ui/core/colors' import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import { withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; export default function Prescription() { return (

Create Allergy

setAllergyId(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" label="Allergy ID" >
setAllergyName(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" />
setRisk(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" />
setPatientId(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" />
setNotes(e.target.value)} variant="outlined" />
Update Allergy
) }
